name: jwks-cache-refresh-lambda
description: lambda che esegue il refresh della cache dei jwks

scripts.test-build: (cd ../../authCommon && npm ci) && npm run-script test && npm run-script coverage && npm run-script sonar && npm run-script build
scripts.build:single: (cd ../../authCommon && npm prune --production) && npm prune --production && rm -f ./function.zip && npm run-script zip:full
scripts.build:multiLayer: (cd ../../authCommon && npm prune --production) && rm -rf nodejs && mkdir -p nodejs && npm prune --production  && cp -Lrf node_modules nodejs && rm -f ./code_layer.zip && npm run-script zip:code && rm -f ./lib_layer.zip && npm run-script zip:libs
scripts.build: npm run-script build:single && npm run-script build:multiLayer
